The Film Blog - About Us

What is The Film Blog?

We are a Team of Former Film Journalists,Academics and Film Analysts whose expertise in the Film Industry has been useful in advancing discussion beyond central discussion around media and the film industry.

How Long has The Film Blog been established.

We started The Film Blog at the start of 2020 around the beginning of the Covid-19 Pandemic in secret and had to work on conceptualizing and maximizing the concepts of what The Film Blog will be in terms of how we would present and create a conversation around Film and Filmaking That is not soley focused on Film Festival,or the base level of celebrity.

We Believe in presenting a more wider conversation around the Filmaking profession and the ask questions about cinema in a futurist context.

USC School Of Media and Arts

What Content does The Film Blog Cover or Wish to Cover?

We cover many angles of Film and Cinema we use school of thought from academia,film criticism, film analysis and Cinemateque to present ideas that engage, present discussion and asks questions to facillitate dialoge and thought. This approach is used to give more in-depth discussion and generate an image beyond common blog standards of the world and art of filmaking.

We want to eventually bring in stronger media content and make professional well researched and conceptualized content that will help to bring our ideas and goals to a clearer forefront. Interviews within the film acdemia and eventually making a discussion within the film industry will be key to what we want to present to the general public.

How does The Film Blog differentiates from other blogs that institute opinion and discussion into their content?

What We want The Film Blog to differentialte from other blogs that we want to present the content from a knowlegdge-Academia, Philosophy, And use Historical Analysis that extends beyond the Last 10-years of filmaking. We believe that film discussion should be based on facts,analysis and using a wider palette of knowledge and ideas in film to facillitate a broader discussion on the future by acknowledging the techniques and cinema perspectives in the Field of Filmaking. Also by making content that can spark knowledge or discussion for cinemaphiles, Academics,and even film collectors who embrace films that present the medium in very differnt lights.

The Film Blog purpose will be to bring new knowledge and thought into the field of cinema overall.
